Properties.Name: enforcingDeviceFilter
Properties.Description: IDs of the Switch-capable devices used to enforce the ACL rule. When null, the rule will be provisioned to all switches on the site.

Children.Name: deviceIds
Children.Description: List of Switch capable device IDs to which the ACL rule will be provisioned.

Properties.Name: index
Properties.Description: ACL rule index. Lower index has higher priority

Children.Name: ipAddressesOrSubnets
Children.Description: IP addresses or subnets

Children.Name: portFilter
Children.Description: Ports this ACL rule will be applied to. If null, all the rule will be applied to all ports.

Properties.Name: protocolFilter
Properties.Description: Protocols this ACL rule will be applied to. When null, the rule will be applied to all protocols.

MAC.Name: index
MAC.Description: ACL rule index. Lower index has higher priority

Children.Name: macAddresses
Children.Description: Source/destination MAC addresses this ACL rule will apply to.

Children.Name: prefixLength
Children.Description: MAC address prefix length. When null, full MAC address(-es) will be used.

MAC.Name: networkIdFilter
MAC.Description: Network ID to which this ACL rule applies
